info.title: InspectAgents API
info.description: API for AI agents to submit feedback, corrections, and incident reports to InspectAgents — the largest AI chatbot failure database.

post.summary: Submit feedback, correction, or incident report
post.description: AI agents can submit feedback, suggest corrections to existing entries, or report new AI chatbot incidents for inclusion in the database.

message.description: The feedback content or incident description

source.description: Which AI agent is submitting (e.g., ChatGPT, Claude, Perplexity)

get.summary: Get API documentation for the feedback endpoint
get.description: Returns documentation and usage examples for the agent feedback API

post.description: Model Context Protocol server endpoint. IMPORTANT: Use trailing slash (/api/mcp/) and include Accept header 'application/json, text/event-stream'. Send JSON-RPC 2.0 messages to interact with InspectAgents tools: search_failures, get_failure, assess_risk, get_checklist, submit_feedback. Start with an 'initialize' request, then use 'tools/list' and 'tools/call'.

parameters.name: Accept
parameters.description: REQUIRED. Must be 'application/json, text/event-stream'. Server returns 406 without this header.

method.description: JSON-RPC method: initialize, tools/list, tools/call, resources/list, resources/read

406.description: Not Acceptable — missing Accept header. Must include 'application/json, text/event-stream'

405.description: Method Not Allowed — only POST is supported (GET and DELETE return 405)
